caption.center: In the Matter of the Accounting of FREDERICK H. MERTENS, as Surviving

HARRIETTE A.F. BAXTER, Individually and as Executrix of JOHN D. FRICKE,

opinion.opinion_text: Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied, with $10 costs.
